column1: '''Carvin Knowles''' (born [[30 September]] [[1963]]<ref>{{webcite|author=|articleurl=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/User:CarvinKnowles|articlename=User:CarvinKnowles|dated=15 May 2011|website=[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Main_Page en.Wikipedia.org]|accessed=18 March 2013}}</ref>) is an American composer
column3: living in New Zealand. He took a BMA in Music Composition from the [[Wikipedia:University of Oklahoma|University of Oklahoma]] in 1988. In 2006
column4: he produced and wrote songs for the [[J.R.R. Tolkien|Tolkien]]-inspired album ''[[In Elven Lands]]''.<ref>{{webcite|author=|articleurl=http://www.carvinknowles.com/bio.html|articlename=Biography|dated=|website=[http://www.carvinknowles.com/ CarvinKnowles.com]|accessed=18 March 2013}}</ref>
